title: Keep Them Warm
tip: Provide a warm, dry shelter and a cozy blanket to snuggle into.

title: Hydration is Key
tip: Check water bowls frequently to ensure water hasn't frozen and encourage them to drink.

title: Paw Protection
tip: Clean their paws after walks to remove ice, salt, or harsh chemicals.

title: Monitor Appetite
tip: Pets may need more food in winter to maintain energy. Consult a vet if appetite drops.
